item.title: Sunset Existing Blogs
item.description: Download the sunsetted sites as archives. Save those here: https://github.com/shaunluttin/website-archives Serve then through CloudFlare pages. Related URLs bigfont.ca www.bigfont.ca blog.bigfont.ca shaunluttin.com www.shaunluttin.com blog.shaunluttin.com socialarts.club www.socialarts.club

item.title: Rebuilding my Blog in Hugo
item.description: Tasks Install Hugo by following the Quickstart. Done. Introduce scripts/ to build and start. Done. Automate the build in GitHub Actions. Philosophy Plain text provides portability. Automate all the things. Free costs less than paid. Make lots of ugly commits - expose the sausage making.
